results.content: A newly conceived life is about as important and valuable as a single cell on a single leaf of a tree .
elo_info: A newly conceived life is about as important and valuable as a single cell on a single leaf of a tree

results.content: Might not be the nicest thing to pluck that leaf off but it doesn't make you a murderer .
elo_info: Might not be the nicest thing to pluck that leaf off but it doesn't make you a murderer

results.content: If any person tried to do this, we would consider that mayhem, and we would allow the victim to defend themselves, up to and including deadly force .
